text: Munahpikkukalum, tankal itayankalil noy ullavarkalum, matinavil poyppiraccaram ceytu kontiruppavarkalum (tam ticceyalkaliliruntu) vilakik kollavillaiyanal, avarkalukku etiraka (natavatikkaikal etuppatai) um'mitam niccayamaka cattuvom. Piraku avarkal veku corpa(kala)meyanri anku umatu antai ayalarkalaka (vacittirukka) mattarkal
